column5: I will be on a trip just north of Flin Flon in the next few weeks, and have always wondered if there is a weather band that my scanner would pick up. I know in the states, you can get weather anywhere, but that far up north for Canada has always been a wonder to me. Does a canadian weather band exist/reach that far north?Thanks much.Steve
Bump..Norhern Manitoban...you out there? figure you might know this one. But then again, you are probably fishing Lakers right now.Steve
